Lyric:
[by:iT_K]

[ar:best friend]

[00:00.79][Produced by Ricky Racks & Young Shad]
[00:01.15]
[00:01.45][Intro]
[00:02.21]Thugger!
[00:03.73]YSL for life, bitch
[00:06.62]Yeah fuck you, your momma and everything else
[00:12.33]Free the GOAT!
[00:13.69]
[00:14.20][Hook]
[00:14.81]That's my best friend, that's my best friend, flexin'
[00:17.89]Big ol' booty bitch missus from Texas, what's next is
[00:21.73]I'm gon' skeet off, lil nigga come catch me, catch me
[00:26.03]And that's my bestie, my bestie, my best friend, go best friend
[00:29.12]Nigga livin' TTG and everything is still on fleek
[00:33.57]Bad bitch rollin' wit' me, she gon' smile cause she on fleek
[00:37.06]Hundred thousand dollars inside my pants, my shit on fleek
[00:40.25]Hey-yeah!
[00:45.15]
[00:45.66][Verse 1]
[00:46.07]Take them boys to school, swagonometry
[00:49.35]Bitch I'm bleeding bad, like a bumble bee
[00:52.70]Hold up! Hold it, hold it, nigga proceed
[00:56.54]I'ma eat that booty just like groceries
[01:00.68]Eat on that coochie, lay that bitch down like "let's do it"
[01:03.87]No Tiger bitch, eat that wood, eat that wood
[01:05.48]Supplier, bitch, I got pistols, no wood
[01:07.35]I want them tacos that are Meagan Good
[01:09.24]Helicopter choppin' with the buz
[01:11.47]Stuff them racks inside them if they nudge
[01:12.99]Bang that other side, nigga curb
[01:14.86]And my reefer louder than a speaker
[01:16.73]Yeah my niece is hanging with The Beatles
[01:18.66]If you ever find her, better keep her
[01:20.63]Thirty seven cameras for the sneakers
[01:22.41]Goin' out like Ox or Beanie Sigel
[01:24.32]Send a cop, I can't wait to mistreat 'em
[01:26.10]Forcin' your ho, I can't wait to mislead 'em
[01:27.62]And beat 'em, they ain't my people
[01:29.64]
[01:29.99][Hook]
[01:30.39]That's my best friend, that's my best friend, flexin'
[01:33.12]Big ol' booty bitch missus from Texas, what's next is
[01:36.91]I'm gon' skeet off, lil nigga come catch me, catch me
[01:41.76]And that's my bestie, my bestie, my best friend, go best friend
[01:44.80]Nigga livin' TTG and everything is still on fleek
[01:49.09]Bad bitch rollin' wit' me, she gon' smile cause she on fleek
[01:52.93]Hundred thousand dollars inside my pants, my shit on fleek
[01:58.25]Hey-yeah!
[01:59.71]

[02:00.93]Let me tell you how I spent a couple hundreds today
[02:04.67]I done cut back on that lean, I'm on that Hen' and D'ussé
[02:08.22]Don't do no talkin' when you see him, you better shoot in his face
[02:12.01]I got a hundred bitches that can't wait to replace
[02:15.87]Michael Jackson nigga, Thugger Jackson moon walkin'
[02:21.07]The S.L.I.M.E. army tool shopping
[02:23.55]Me a horny goat, I'm boolin' at the bull stop
[02:27.05]No I can't get arrested cause I'm talkin' bout my necklace
[02:30.44]I'mma put that bitch in the buck, I'm a dog, let’s get stuck
[02:34.68]My lil' sister Dora, eat them Lucky Charms and give me luck
[02:38.37]Waddup cus? Here yo' cup, call my Bloods, bring my bup
[02:42.06]Your crew suck, don't got bucks, these ain't drugs nigga
[02:45.15]

[02:45.81]That's my best friend, that's my best friend, flexin'
[02:49.00]Big ol' booty bitch missus from Texas, what's next is
